participant_1.background:
I'm the oldest, so I often feel like I need to take care of my younger siblings.
I'm having a hard time waking up in the morning, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel.
I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy listening to the music of Katy Perry as it reminds me of my younger years.
I drive a minivan because it's roomy and comfortable for my family.
I love the website The Spruce because it has so many great tips for cleaning everything in my home, including my glasses!
i am afraid of the dark.
I used to be afraid to speak my mind, but now I am more confident in expressing my opinions.

content.text: Hi! I'm trying to find a new place to live, because I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies. Do you have any suggestions?
I do! I just moved into a new place that has a huge closet! It's even bigger than my old closet, and I had plenty of space in that one.
That's great! I'm excited to find a new place to live. I've been having a hard time waking up in the morning, but I'm enjoying my mystery novel.
I'm not a big fan of mystery novels, but I love listening to music. Katy Perry is my favorite artist. Her music reminds me of my younger years.
I've never been a fan of Katy Perry, but I'm glad you enjoy her music. I'm doing well in school, but I miss my dad a lot. He passed away last year.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I lost my dad a few years ago, too. It's hard to deal with, but it gets easier with time.
Thank you. I'm trying to stay positive. I'm looking forward to changing my look to reflect my new single status.
That's a great idea! I used to be afraid of speaking my mind, but now I'm more confident in expressing my opinions. I think you should be the same way.
Thanks for the advice. I'm going to try to be more confident. I think it's going to be a good year.
I think so too! You're going to do great things
